column4: I've been wanting to see this unity thing, and I was under the impression it does 3d stuff which I'm not sure my vid supports... can someone help me to explore whether and how it's supported?
my video from lspci is: 01:05.0 VGA compatible controller [0300]: ATI Technologies Inc M880G [Mobility Radeon HD 4200] [1002:9712]
try the livecd, I think you can sample unity with it
